content:
From: Lawrence Paulson <lp15@cam.ac.uk>
A bug in recent versions of the SML/NJ lexer is responsible for this
error. Certain illegal characters (necessarily in comments) make the
lexer fail. The fix is to download the latest development version of
the sources, or manually find and remove the illegal characters.

Larry

From: William Billingsley <whb21@cam.ac.uk>
Thanks very much to Florian for helping me past my previous problem.
However I've now received this exception from running
./build HOL:

exception Fail raised: stuck state
at command "use"
ExnDuringExecution

HOL log zipped and attached.

Any help really would be appreciated.

thanks everso,
Will.
HOL.zip
